title: [Mega Tracking] Align Codebase to Spec v0.5
body:
Note: This is mainly a tracking issue and the items from here should not take precedent over priority tasks such as sync, run time and E2E test issues. Any potential PR from this issue list will have to go through E2E test before merge.

This issue tracks the overall progress of updating the current beacon chain implementation to spec [v0.5](https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/releases/tag/v0.5.0) Here is what has been done so far and the missing steps:

### **Phase 0 Beacon Chain Spec**

🍪 **Features:**

| Descriptions  | Eth2.0 spec PR   | Prysm PR   |
|------------ | ------------- |-------------|
| make get_beacon_proposer_index safe for next epoch  |  [694](https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/pull/694)  |   |
| utilize updated version of ssz signed_root | [725](https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/pull/725)  |   |
| modify BeaconState and Deposit fields to utilize new ssz fixed length tuples|  [737](https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/pull/737)|  |
| break LMD GHOST ties in favor of higher hash tree roots |  [674](https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/pull/674) | |
| epoch transition at start of epoch  | [732](https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/pull/732) [741](https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/pull/741)|   |
|remove merkle_root and instead use hash_tree_root everywhere|  [739](https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/pull/739)|   |
|weaken criterion for attestation inclusion|[752](https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/pull/752)|   |
|disallow duplicate voluntary exits|[751](https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/pull/751)|   |
|validator cannot exit until 2048 epochs|[746](https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/pull/746)|   |
|proposer slashing based upon epoch rather than slot|  [762](https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/pull/762)|   |
|fair proposer selection by using epoch|[733](https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/pull/733)|   |
|improve fork version/signature domain semantics|[738](https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/pull/738)|   |

| fix handling of bad proof of possession in deposit |  [689](https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/pull/689)  | N/A |
| minor bugs related to ordering/typos/var-mismatch/etc |  [648](https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/pull/648) [650](https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/pull/650) [654](https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/pull/654) [656](https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/pull/656) [664](https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/pull/664) [661](https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/pull/661)  |  #1723 |
